question_en_UK: If you divide 6 candies equally between two friends, how many will each person receive?
question_de_DE: Wenn man 6 Bonbons zu gleichen Teilen zwischen zwei Freunden aufteilt, wie viele bekommt dann jeder?

question: 다음 순서대로 공룡 알을 세어 암호를 만들어보세요: 초식2, 육식4, 초식1
question_en_US: Count the dinosaur eggs in the following order to create a code: Herbivore 2, Carnivore 4, Herbivore 1
question_en_UK: Count the dinosaur eggs in the following order to create a code: herbivore 2, carnivore 4, herbivore 1.
question_de_DE: Zähle die Dinosaurier-Eier in der folgenden Reihenfolge und erstelle daraus einen Code: Pflanzenfresser 2, Fleischfresser 4, Pflanzenfresser 1.

question: 알 순서대로 숫자를 정리해보세요: 티라노1, 벨로3, 브라키오2
question_en_US: Arrange the numbers in the order of the eggs: T. rex 1, Velociraptor 3, Brachiosaurus 2
question_en_UK: Arrange the numbers in the order of the eggs: T. rex 1, Velociraptor 3, Brachiosaurus 2.
question_de_DE: Ordne die Zahlen in der Reihenfolge der Eier: Tyrannosaurus 1, Velociraptor 3, Brachiosaurus 2.

question: 왼쪽부터 공룡이 발견한 숫자를 찾아보세요: [3][i][8][A][6]
question_en_US: Find the numbers the dinosaur discovered from left to right: [3][i][8][A][6]
question_en_UK: Find the numbers discovered by the dinosaurs from left to right: [3][i][8][A][6].
question_de_DE: Finde die Zahlen, die der Dinosaurier von links gefunden hat: [3][i][8][A][6]

question: 공룡이 오른쪽부터 거꾸로 먹은 숫자는? [5][2][i][A][9]
question_en_US: What numbers did the dinosaur eat in reverse order from right to left? [5][2][i][A][9]
question_en_UK: What numbers did the dinosaur eat backwards from right to left? [5][2][i][A][9]
question_de_DE: Welche Zahlen hat der Dinosaurier von rechts nach links gefressen? [5][2][i][A][9]

question: 공룡이 발소리를 1번, 2번, 3번... 다음은 뭘까요?
question_en_US: The dinosaur made one, two, three... What comes next?
question_en_UK: The dinosaur made footsteps 1, 2, 3... What comes next?
question_de_DE: Der Dinosaurier macht 1, 2, 3 Schritte... Was kommt als Nächstes?

question: 어떤 숫자가 더 클까요?
question_en_US: Which number is bigger?
question_en_UK: Which number is bigger?
question_de_DE: Welche Zahl ist größer?

question: 간단한 계산: "사과 3개가 있었는데 1개를 먹었어요. 남은 개수는?"
question_en_US: Simple calculations: “There were 3 apples, and I ate 1. How many are left?”
question_en_UK: Simple calculations: ‘There were 3 apples, and I ate 1. How many are left?’
question_de_DE: Einfache Rechenaufgaben: „Es gab 3 Äpfel, von denen ich 1 gegessen habe. Wie viele sind noch übrig?“

question: 사과가 7개가 있습니다. 2개를 먹고 2개는 친구에게 줬습니다. 몇 개 남았나요?
question_en_US: There are 7 apples. I ate 2 and gave 2 to my friend. How many are left?
question_en_UK: There are 7 apples. I ate 2 and gave 2 to my friend. How many are left?
question_de_DE: Es gibt 7 Äpfel. Ich habe 2 gegessen und 2 an einen Freund verschenkt. Wie viele sind noch übrig?

question: 사과가 8개 있는데 4개씩 나눠주면 몇 명에게 줄 수 있나요?
question_en_US: There are 8 apples. If I give 4 to each person, how many people can I give them to?
question_en_UK: There are 8 apples. If I give 4 to each person, how many people can I give them to?
question_de_DE: Es gibt 8 Äpfel. Wenn ich jeweils 4 Äpfel verteile, an wie viele Personen kann ich sie verteilen?

question: 엄마가 10,000원을 주셨고 3,000원을 썼습니다. 남은 돈은 얼마인가요?
question_en_US: Mom gave me 10,000 won and I spent 3,000 won. How much money is left?
question_en_UK: Mum gave me 10,000 won and I spent 3,000 won. How much money is left?
question_de_DE: Mama hat mir 10.000 Won gegeben und ich habe 3.000 Won ausgegeben. Wie viel Geld habe ich noch übrig?

question: 공룡 발자국 순서를 보고 암호를 풀어보세요: 3번째-1, 1번째-9, 2번째-4
question_en_US: Look at the order of the dinosaur footprints and solve the code: 3rd-1, 1st-9, 2nd-4
question_en_UK: Look at the order of the dinosaur footprints and solve the code: 3rd-1, 1st-9, 2nd-4
question_de_DE: Entschlüsseln Sie den Code anhand der Reihenfolge der Dinosaurier-Fußabdrücke: 3rd-1, 1st-9, 2nd-4

question: 어떤 숫자가 더 클까요?
question_en_US: Which number is larger?
question_en_UK: Which number is larger?
question_de_DE: Welche Zahl ist größer?

question: 수직선에서 3과 5 사이의 수는?
question_en_US: What number is between 3 and 5 on the vertical line?
question_en_UK: What number is between 3 and 5 on the vertical line?
question_de_DE: Welche Zahl liegt zwischen 3 und 5 auf der vertikalen Linie?

question: 숫자 배열 중 다음에 올 숫자는? 2, 4, 6, __
question_en_US: What number comes next in the sequence? 2, 4, 6, __
question_en_UK: What number comes next in the number sequence? 2, 4, 6, __
question_de_DE: Welche Zahl kommt als Nächstes in der Zahlenreihe? 2, 4, 6, __

question: 숫자 순서 배열: 다음 중 오름차순으로 배열된 것은?
question_en_US: Number sequence: Which of the following is arranged in ascending order?
question_en_UK: Number sequence arrangement: Which of the following is arranged in ascending order?
question_de_DE: Zahlenreihenfolge: Welche der folgenden Reihen ist in aufsteigender Reihenfolge angeordnet?

question: 다음 중 짝수만 고르세요.
question_en_US: Select only even numbers from the following.
question_en_UK: Select only even numbers from the following.
question_de_DE: Wählen Sie nur gerade Zahlen aus.

question: 10보다 작은 수를 모두 고르세요.
question_en_US: Select all numbers less than 10.
question_en_UK: Select all numbers smaller than 10.
question_de_DE: Wählen Sie alle Zahlen aus, die kleiner als 10 sind.

question: 1km를 걸으면 보통 15분이 걸립니다. 3km를 걸으면 몇 분이 걸릴까요?
question_en_US: It usually takes 15 minutes to walk 1 km. How long will it take to walk 3 km?
question_en_UK: It usually takes 15 minutes to walk 1 km. How long will it take to walk 3 km?
question_de_DE: 1 km zu Fuß zurückzulegen dauert normalerweise 15 Minuten. Wie lange dauert es, 3 km zu Fuß zurückzulegen?

question: 엄마가 10,000원을 주셨고 5,000원을 쓰고 다시 3,000원을 썼습니다. 남은 돈은 얼마인가요?
question_en_US: Mom gave me 10,000 won, and I spent 5,000 won and then another 3,000 won. How much money do I have left?
question_en_UK: My mum gave me 10,000 won, I spent 5,000 won, and then I spent another 3,000 won. How much money do I have left?
question_de_DE: Mama hat mir 10.000 Won gegeben, ich habe 5.000 Won ausgegeben und dann noch einmal 3.000 Won. Wie viel Geld habe ich noch übrig?

question: 계단 수가 100, 90, 80, 다음은 뭘까요?
question_en_US: The number of steps is 100, 90, 80. What comes next?
question_en_UK: The number of steps is 100, 90, 80. What comes next?
question_de_DE: Die Anzahl der Stufen beträgt 100, 90, 80. Was kommt als Nächstes?

question: 어떤 숫자가 더 클까요?
question_en_US: Which number is larger?

question: 화면에 보이는 도형이 8개입니다. 이 중 절반은 몇 개인가요?
question_en_US: There are 8 shapes on the screen. How many are half of them?
question_en_UK: There are 8 shapes on the screen. How many are half of them?
question_de_DE: Auf dem Bildschirm sind 8 Formen zu sehen. Wie viele davon sind die Hälfte?
